content:
```text
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when crafting
- Some items cannot be crafted by hand and require a crafting machine or furnace. Check the recipe requirements before attempting to craft.
### Errors when extracting from a furnace
- Ensure that the furnace contains the item you are trying to extract before attempting to extract it. Check the furnace inventory first.

# NAMESPACE
```
